author: Rachel Keck
title: ‘I was hooked.’ This Flowery Branch coffee roaster didn’t like coffee. Now, he hopes to make his brand a household name
description: Where one may hear the hum of a small coffee roasting operation, Jesus Palacios hears the melody of a dream come true.

author: Bradley Hicks
title: Arnold Air Force Base marks 76th birthday of U.S. Air Force in style
description: Dinner, dancing, dapper duds and elegant attire were the order of the evening Sept. 9 as the Arnold Air Force Base Company Grade Officers’ Council hosted the Arnold Engineering Development Complex Air Force Ball at the Manchester/Coffee County Conference Center. The ball was held to coincide with the 76th birthday of the U.S. Air Force. Disclaimer: The CGOC is a private organization which is not part of the Department of Defense or any of its components and has no governmental status

author: Ashee Pamma
title: Coffee Briefing Sept. 19 – Canada staggers in internet affordability in new report; ScotiaBank, JPMorgan team up; Amazon awards scholarships to 10 Canadian students; and more
description: Coffee Briefings are timely deliveries of the latest ITWC headlines, interviews, and podcasts. Today’s Coffee Briefing is delivered by IT World Canada’s editorial team! Missed last week’s Coffee Briefing? We’ve got you covered. Canada continues to falter in internet affordability in new report According to a new report by SurfShark, Canada has the second best internet

author: Jay Barmann
title: Elderly SF Woman Suing McDonald's Over Scalding Coffee In Similar Lawsuit to One From Early 90s
description: McDonald's still apparently serves their drive-thru coffee exceedingly hot, and a San Francisco woman is claiming that a poorly affixed lid on a coffee cup, served to her at the Fillmore McDonald's, led to her getting serious burns, and she's now suing.

author: Veronika Bondarenko
title: A major airline could be in trouble for a gross (and dangerous) reason
description: A Korean Air passenger flying from China to South Korea took a sip of an iced coffee and realized something was wrong.

author: Maia Luem
title: My Brother’s Bar owner bringing coffee shop, food truck park to West Colfax
description: Full Tank Food Park a mashup of a traditional neighborhood coffee shop and a food truck park.

author: John Smith
title: Estepona Now Has Deputy Mayor In Cancelada
description: There were two very welcome guests at the monthly AREME coffee morning held at Alex Corner in Benavista, Estepona on the morning of Monday September 18. Two representatives of the Estepona Council, Deputy Mayor Begonia Ortiz who is now situated at the Council Office in Cancelada and Foreign Residents representative, Aleksandra Broch. The Foreign Residents […]

author: Austin Fleskes
title: Police searching for man believed to be involved in ‘series of sex offenses’ at Fort Collins, Loveland coffee shops
description: Anyone with information regarding the incidents or who may know the identity of the suspect can contact FCPS Police Officer Dalton Brown at 970-416-2238. Residents can also contact Crime Stoppers of Larimer County at 970-221-6868.

author: Nicki Cox
title: Kyle Richards and Morgan Wade spotted on stroll in Paris after ‘intimate’ outing
description: The pair, who were spotted getting cozy while on a coffee date last week, were all smiles as they strolled the streets during a fun-filled shopping day.

author: Lee Tulloch
title: $18 for a coffee? Travelling in Europe is painful right now
description: To survive, economically, in Europe this summer, I had to revert to my old travelling-while-broke strategies.

author: Elana Fishman
title: Meghan Markle’s sold-out J.Crew sweater blazer from the Invictus Games is back: Preorder it now
description: On Instagram, the retailer cheekily described the style as "the perfect polished layer for the office, coffee dates ... and sporting events."

author: Sarah Page
title: Shoppers welcome return of landmark Horsham coffee shop
description: Shoppers in Horsham are welcoming the return of a landmark coffee shop.

author: Dani Valent
title: Better latte than never: Toorak finally gets seriously good coffee (and great food) with the opening of Yuca
description: Stand by for XO folded eggs and mushrooms with spring onion pancake and kimchi, Toorakians. Yuca’s chef is shaking up the cafe menu.

author: Samrat Sardar
title: “She a Badie”: 50-Year-Old Lady Impresses Fans as She Celebrates Her Birthday in Style by Training With Floyd Mayweather’s Father
description: Floyd Mayweather Sr., the father of legendary boxer Floyd Mayweather Jr. recently helped a 50-year-old lady celebrate her birthday. While people usually visit their favorite restaurant or coffee shop to blow out candles, the lady decided to step inside the boxing ring.
